name: JOSWIN TONY
top_product: Accounting with MIS Reporting for Decision Making We go beyond basic bookkeeping. Our accounting service is designed to give business owners financial clarity, not just compliance. Along with maintaining books of accounts, we build customized MIS reports that highlight key metrics like: Profitability by product or service Receivables aging and follow-up alerts Expense trends and cost leakages Cash flow position and monthly comparisons This service is ideal for business owners who want to make better decisions, track performance, and plan growth — not just file returns. If you know a business that’s growing but has no idea where the money is going, we can set up a system that brings both control and confidence.
ideal_referral: My ideal referral is an IT company based in Infopark or a business owner based in the Middle East who is looking for reliable financial support from India. I'm looking for: IT or software companies in Infopark or SmartCity Kochi needing accounting systems, internal audits, or virtual CFO support Middle East-based entrepreneurs needing help with accounting, compliance, or management reporting Startups or MSMEs planning to scale and needing support with financial projections, fundraising, or MIS systems
top_problem_solved: We conducted a detailed internal audit for Santamonica Study Abroad, a leading overseas education consultancy. While their revenues were strong, they struggled with operational issues. Through our audit, we uncovered several operational inefficiencies, including overlapping roles, underutilized resources, and uncontrolled branch-level expenses. We also identified cost leakages in marketing spends, travel reimbursements, and vendor contracts that had not been reviewed in years. With our recommendations, the management was able to: Restructure workflows and delegate effectively Plug revenue leakages and cut avoidable expenses Set up a monthly MIS system to track performance metrics across departments This not only improved profitability but also brought more control and peace of mind to the leadership team.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my favourite BNI stories was when I co-hosted a powerful workshop for entrepreneurs alongside Dr. Renjith Raj, a renowned management consultant and a BNI member. The event brought together 50+ business owners, and it was more than just a training — it was a true showcase of BNI collaboration in action. From the venue, event management, and catering, to photography, video coverage, and marketing, almost every aspect of the event was handled by fellow BNI members. It was a live example of how Givers Gain creates real results when members come together with purpose. This event not only created value for the participants but also led to long-term business relationships and referrals for everyone involved.

name: VISHNU NAIR
business: POCKET TAX AND FINANCIAL CONSULTANCY PRIVATE LIMITED
my_business:
CMA Vishnu Nair | Founder – Pockettax
GST | Refunds | Resolutions | Registrations | Results.
top_product: GST Litigation – We represent clients before GST officers, appellate authorities, and tribunals, helping them resolve complex tax disputes, show-cause notices, and departmental objections with strategic legal support. GST Refund Management – We assist exporters and eligible businesses in claiming their rightful refunds efficiently, even in cases where claims are delayed, rejected, or stuck due to documentation or system issues. Other key services include Income Tax compliance, business incorporation, internal audits, and financial restructuring tailored to suit growing businesses.
ideal_referral: A business owner, startup founder, or finance head of an MSME/exporting company who is either: Starting a new venture and needs support with company incorporation and registrations, Struggling with GST refunds or notices requiring litigation expertise, or Seeking ongoing financial advisory and compliance management to ensure peace of mind. Typical signs include: “Our GST refund is pending for months,” “We just got a notice and don’t know what to do,” or “We want to set up a new company but don’t know where to begin.” Anyone handling ₹50 lakh+ turnover and looking for a dependable tax and business advisor is a perfect referral for me.
top_problem_solved: A leading Indian pharmaceutical company had ₹120 crores in pending GST refunds across multiple states for over 1.5 years. We strategized and executed a litigation-based refund mechanism and successfully recovered the entire amount within 2 months — without legal escalation.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of my first major export clients came through a simple 30-second BNI introduction. A fellow member connected me with their logistics contact, and that turned into a long-term engagement involving GST, audit, and restructuring work. It reaffirmed that consistent BNI participation can convert even casual connects into high-value business.
